title: Aaron Rodgers magic, Rams still undefeated after win over Bucs, Chargers outlast the Chiefs, and MNF Preview!
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers magic, Rams still undefeated after win over Bucs, Chargers outlast the Chiefs, and MNF Preview!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Golden Tate reflect on another comeback win from Aaron Rodgers. The Chargers went into Kansas City and came out with a win over the Chiefs. The crew awards Game Balls for the best performances in NFL Week 3 and explain how the Rams, Raiders, Broncos, Cardinals and Panthers are still undefeated. Plus, we preview the MNF matchup between the Eagles and Cowboys.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
